description: This file defines a React component 'Sidebar' that renders the sidebar navigation menu for a SaaS platform frontend. It includes navigation links with icons, an organization switcher, and a sign-out button, utilizing Next.js routing, supabase auth, and icon components.

methods.name: handleSignOut
methods.description: Asynchronous function that signs out the user via Supabase auth and redirects to the login page.
